name: Birth
description: Tim Cook is born in Robertsdale, Alabama, USA.

name: Graduation from Auburn University
description: Tim Cook graduates with a Bachelor of Science in Industrial Engineering from Auburn University.

name: Joining Compaq
description: Tim Cook joins Compaq as a Director of Corporate Materials.

name: Joining Apple Inc.
description: Tim Cook joins Apple Inc. as Senior Vice President for Worldwide Operations.

name: Promotion to COO
description: Tim Cook is promoted to Chief Operating Officer (COO) of Apple Inc.

name: Becomes CEO of Apple Inc.
description: Tim Cook is named CEO of Apple Inc., succeeding Steve Jobs.

name: Apple Watch Announcement
description: Tim Cook announces the Apple Watch, a new product line for Apple Inc.

name: iPhone 13 Release
description: Apple releases the iPhone 13 series under Tim Cook's leadership.
